com.kedzie.drawer
Interface DraggedDrawer.DrawerListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
DraggedDrawer.SimpleDrawerListener
Enclosing class:
DraggedDrawer
public static interface DraggedDrawer.DrawerListener

Listener for monitoring events about drawers.

Method Summary
 void onDrawerClosed()
          Called when a drawer has settled in a completely closed state.
 void onDrawerOpened()
          Called when a drawer has settled in a completely open state.
 void onDrawerSlide(float slideOffset)
          Called when a drawer's position changes.
 void onDrawerStateChanged(int newState)
          Called when the drawer motion state changes.
 

Method Detail

onDrawerSlide

void onDrawerSlide(float slideOffset)
Called when a drawer's position changes.

Parameters:
slideOffset - The new offset of this drawer within its range, from 0-1 with 1 being totally open, 0 meaning totally closed.

onDrawerOpened

void onDrawerOpened()
Called when a drawer has settled in a completely open state. The drawer is interactive at this point.

onDrawerClosed

void onDrawerClosed()
Called when a drawer has settled in a completely closed state.

onDrawerStateChanged

void onDrawerStateChanged(int newState)
Called when the drawer motion state changes. The new state will be one of DragLayout.STATE_IDLE, DragLayout.STATE_DRAGGING or DragLayout.STATE_SETTLING.

Parameters:
newState - The new drawer motion state
